create: kubectl wait --for=condition=Ready $(kubectl get pods -o=name | grep argocd-server) --timeout=120s
connect: ARGOCD_PASSWORD=$(kubectl get secret argocd-initial-admin-secret -o jsonpath='{.data.password}' | base64 -d)

echo "

Please connect to https://localhost:8000 using 'admin' as username and '$ARGOCD_PASSWORD' as password

"
